interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Flawless Liquid Foundation Cream, Liquid Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, BB Cream, Long Lasting, Invisible Pores, Base Nude Face Moisturizing Liquid Cover Concealer,Universal for ALL Skin Type
Review Date: 2019/09/27
Store: Cherioll
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherioll', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '1.35 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.76 x 1.57 x 1.5 inches; 3.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: This foundation is like no other foundation.  It is definitely not your average foundation.  It blends in almost immediately with your own skin color because of this, it never looks caked on or leaves makeup lines around the jawline.  It has an SPF coverage of 15 which is a nice added bonus.  The foundation seems to leave a nice cross between matte and dewy while minimizing the pores.  It is much more moisturizing then the average foundation also.  My skin used to be on the dryer side and now I have normal skin thanks to this product.
Review Title: Colour Changing Foundation
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Flawless Finish Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, All-Day Flawless Foundation Makeup, Covering Imperfections Liquid Complete Foundation, Suitable for ALL Skin Types
CIDBEST
{'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 1.65 x 1.3 inches; 4.13 Ounces'}
This makeup is crazy.  It comes out of the bottle looking like a white colored moisturizer.  When applied to the face, it immediately begins to blend with the color of the skin right before your eyes.  It has somewhat of a weird smell if you put your nose up to the bottle.  I didn't notice it once I applied or throughout the day.  This makeup does not come off onto your clothes like regular foundation.  It comes off the same way it went on.  When applying it, it goes on more like moisturizer then makeup.  Its got SPF in it so it takes an extra swipe or two to get it to completely blend in but when it does its so lightweight, you don't even notice its there. It just leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth.  Oh and you don't get that later in the day shiney look with this makeup.  It really is pretty cool stuff!
Doesn't leave marks on clothes!
Flawless Liquid Foundation Cream, Liquid Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, BB Cream, Long Lasting, Invisible Pores, Base Nude Face Moisturizing Liquid Cover Concealer,Universal for ALL Skin Type
Cherioll

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:** The user continues to favor lightweight makeup products with moisturizing properties that blend seamlessly with their natural skin tone. They appreciate foundations that provide good coverage while feeling comfortable on the skin. Their recent purchase highlights an interest in innovative products like color-changing foundations.

- **Key Features Valued:** The user seeks foundations that offer SPF protection, long-lasting wear, and non-transferable formulas. They prefer a finish that strikes a balance between matte and dewy, avoiding excessive shine throughout the day. The added benefit of pore minimization is particularly valued, as they have transitioned from dry to normal skin.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** Sensitivity to product scent remains noted, though it has not significantly impacted their application experience.

- **General Sentiment:** The user maintains a positive sentiment towards experimentation and novelty in makeup, as evidenced by their latest review which expresses enthusiasm for its unique blending ability and hydration benefits. 

- **Rating Behavior:** The user's moderate ratings suggest a balanced approach to product evaluation, considering both positive attributes and any drawbacks. They recently gave a high rating to a foundation that met their criteria for effectiveness and comfort.

This profile reflects a user who actively seeks effective, innovative beauty solutions that enhance their skincare routine while prioritizing comfort, convenience, and adaptability.
